_comment: This is the aggregated PLUGINS.json format. See PLUGIN-FORMAT.md for complete format specification. Individual plugin PLUGIN.json files follow the same structure.

greeting-action.action: Respond with 'ðŸŒŸ Hello! I'm excited to help you build something amazing today! What are you working on?'

git-status-action.description: Check git repository status and report back to user

create-command-action.action: Prompt for command details, generate JSON definition, and save to commands.json

count-increment-action.action: Maintain a persistent counter in memory. Increment by 1 or by the specified amount if provided. Display the new counter value. Counter starts at 0 if not initialized.
count-increment-action.description: Increment counter and display current value

count-reset-action.action: Reset the persistent counter to 0. Display confirmation message: 'Counter reset to 0'

suggest-steps-action.action: Analyze the current context and suggest 3-5 actionable next steps

unload-plugins-action.action: Deactivate plugin mode and acknowledge with 'âœ… Plugins unloaded. Standard response mode.' Return to normal Claude Code operation without evaluating messages against plugin patterns.
unload-plugins-action.description: Deactivate plugin mode and return to standard operation
